101.name: Did not commit last 7 days
recommendedActions: Check if users update tasks in JIRA properly
Break big tasks into multiple smaller ones
Check if users are still working on this segment, reassign them if not

102.name: Work
recommendedActions: Monitor the workload of affected users and the team overall. Offload tasks to other team members if possible
Encourage employees to take their vacations and completely unplug
Reward hard work with some Tayra Items
